prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. A man with long dark hair tied loosely back stands indoors, his expression shifting as he speaks with animated energy and expressive lip movement. He wears a traditional robe with earthy tones over a white inner garment, his posture relaxed yet engaged. Soft ambient light illuminates his face evenly, highlighting the fluid motion of his lips as he speaks loudly but calmly, conveying emotion through subtle emphasis rather than force. His head begins facing forward, then turns gently to his right side as if addressing someone off frame, before returning smoothly to face front again. His hands move slowly in sync with his speech — one hand lifts slightly near his chest, fingers lightly curled, while the other rests along his torso, occasionally drifting upward in a gentle arc. His gaze remains steady and focused throughout, matching the rhythm of his words. The scene feels grounded and intentional, capturing a moment of quiet intensity through deliberate gestures and controlled vocal expression. The camera holds steady at eye level, framing his upper body and facial expressions clearly as he communicates with presence and grace.
